content.question: Which of the following is the dependent variable in the study?

choices.label: The tract of land that was clear-cut for the housing development
A tract of land in a heavily forested area outside of town
The density of a species of algae growing along the bottom of the river
The flow rate of the river from north to south

content.answer: The density of a species of algae growing along the bottom of the river

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
